short_summary: Request for Proposal (RFP) for Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) for engineering and security services
description: This tender opportunity is for the DRDC Canadian Safety and Security Program (CSSP) Call For Proposal (CFP) for engineering and security services. The proposal is open to all public (federal, provincial, territorial, municipal) and private sector entities.  The anticipated contract start date is April 1, 2026.
full_summary:
# DRDC Canadian Safety and Security Program (CSSP) Call For Proposal (CFP)
* **Title (English)**: DRDC Canadian Safety and Security Program (CSSP) Call For Proposal (CFP) W7714-238424
* **Title (French)**: Programme canadien pour la sûreté et la sécurité (PCSS) appel de propositions (AP) W7714-238424
* **Reference Number**: WS3372838511-Doc3372859793
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3372838511
* **Publication Date**: October 24, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 16, 2022 (2:00 PM ET)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: N/A
* **Expected Contract End Date**: April 1, 2026
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity**: Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC)

The Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is issuing a Call for Proposals (CFP) on behalf of the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) for the provision of services related to the Canadian Safety and Security Program.

**Overview**:
This CFP is an open tender opportunity available to all public and private sector entities. The proposed services are in support of DRDC’s mandate to provide research, development, and technology to support Canada’s defence and security needs.

**Details**:
* **Classification Number (UNSPSC/Monocon)**:  *81000000, *92000000, *92111700
* **Classification Description (English)**: Engineering and Research and Technology Based Services, National Defense and Public Order and Security and Safety Services, Military science and research
* **Classification Description (French)**: Services d’ingénierie et de recherche et services technologiques, Services de défense nationale, d’ordre public, de secours et de sécurité, Science et recherche militaires
* **Procurement Category**: Service contract
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Trade Agreement**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

**How to respond**:
To review the CFP documents, ask and review questions, and submit a proposal, please follow the link to the SAP Ariba discovery page: [insert link]. Don’t
